Site Name

Dry Oar Rafting Company

Site Purpose

Promote company and provide information about company

Audience

Information this site provides: -Where the rafting company is located -How to contact the company(phone number/email) -Description river this company uses for rafting -Description of pricce and the expirience

Logo

Color Scheme

(80E4F1) Sky blue- accent color (DA7203) Orcher/orange- Color for headers Black- Main color for text *Color scheme is based off logo

Typography

Roboto Slab- Used for headings Yaldevi- Used for regular text
